summary.intent: Document the existing Remediate feature in the README by adding a mention in the intro and creating a dedicated section explaining how the AI-powered automatic fixing works.
summary.outcome: Successfully added remediation documentation to README.md with an updated intro paragraph and a new detailed section covering workflow, output format, and manual prompt generation alternative. Changes committed with all tests and checks passing.

repo: Project uses bun as package manager and test runner
Pre-commit hooks run tests, lint, and typecheck automatically
Remediate feature is web UI only, not available in CLI

code.finding: Intro paragraph describes core tool functionality and is the appropriate place to mention major features like remediation
Remediation section logically fits between 'Understanding Results' and 'Evaluators' sections

workflow: Plan mode was used to structure the documentation changes before implementation
Verification step included both reading the updated file and running tests/lint
Git workflow follows standard pattern: status check, diff review, log review for commit style, then stage and commit
